review: Freezes all the time, when I first got it I loved it . Now I can barley do anything without it freezing .

review: Easy to set up, easy to navigate.

review: I LOVE MY FIRE STICK, INSTALLMENT WAS SUPER EASY!!!! WOULD HAVE GIVEN 10 STARS IF I COULD.

review: This thing is awesome!  I'm not the most tech-savvy user, but I was able to use it straight out of the box with no problems.  Wonderful for streaming movies on the tv without attaching a laptop or computer.

review: We love it! We wish more movies and tv shows where included with Prime but it serves it's purpose as it is.

review: Not worth your time.  Skips and picture distorts.  Go ahead and get the Fire TV box.
